data.description: Keystone Titans VR is a VR Autobattler where units will need to be strategically selected and arranged to dominate your opponents. Outsmart the enemy with clever drafting, positioning, and economy management to form the strongest team.

changelog.change_log:
Patch notes 1.11

*Fixed bug that would cause bots to not use all their champion slots
*Bots signficantly more likely to 2 star champions early game
*Bots more likely to replace duplicate champions mid game
*Adjusted bot positioning to priortize safety of their carries
*Bots slightly more likely to use items and shift them around. 
*Fixed bug that allowed player's to use enemy items.
*Items attached to champions that increase in star level are now added to the upgraded champion

Patch 1.1

Items 
* Added items which can be added to champions to provide bonus stats.
* Adjusted tutorial to include item usage.
* Added bonus rounds to earn items.
* Added item usage to bots. 


AI Fixes
* Fixed bug that prevented AI from purchasing 2-4 cost champions.
* AI team compositions diversity significantly increased. 

General Changes
* Reduced spawn distance from northern side of the board to make both sides more consistent.
* Champion star level now marked on their HP bars and item info.
* Fixed Luna's walking animation freezing.
* HP loss now increases as the game continues. 

Balance changes
* Triple threat bonus reduced from 70% to 30%.
* Increased Dusk tier 1 damage from 5 damage per second to 10 damage per second.
* Increased Dusk tier 3 damage from 40 damage per second to 60 damage per second.
* Jug Attack damage reduced from 40 to 30.
* Finn base health increased from 700 to 800 .
* Increased luna's Ability power ratio from 0.2--> 0.5.
* Increased Infernum's Ability power ratio from 0.3-->0.6 on base damage.
* Increased player start gold from 5 to 6.
* Reduced first 3 preparation rounds from 30 seconds to 20 seconds.

Patch notes 1.04

*Added user interface that shows the chance of getting a champion of each cost
*Fixed bug that prevented 4 cost champion ability description from being displayed 
*Added specific numbers and more details for several abilities based on player feedback

Patch 1.03

*Added winstreaks/loststreaks bonus gold  
*Added sound effect for leveling up
*Added visual indicator when the player has unused champion slots
*Fixed Jug missing special attack icon
